TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SourceChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class SourceChangedEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class SourceChangedEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

summary.span: 為 SourceChanged 事件提供用於交互操作的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the SourceChanged event, used for interoperation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceChanged 事件是路由的事件，其中的事件識別項不會公開。The SourceChanged event is a routed event where the event identifier is not publicly exposed. 這是因為此事件來扮演一個潛在的重大中的互通性，而且不應該允許任意比已知的內部實作的任何其他來源所引發子類別 (目前，只有這種類別是).This is because this event plays a potentially critical part in interoperation and should not be allowed to be raised arbitrarily by any other source than the internal implementation of a known subclass (currently, the only such class is ). 當實作交互操作的解決方案，您可以附加或移除事件處理常式 (藉由呼叫和分別)，但您無法執行正常供路由的事件，例如類別處理其他作業正在將擁有者，或引發任意項目來源的事件。When implementing an interoperation solution, you can attach or remove handlers for the event (by calling and , respectively) but you cannot perform other operations normally available to routed events such as class handling, adding owners, or raising the event from an arbitrary element source. 這個類別會覆寫虛擬方法，以便傳回事件系統要求時的特定類型的處理常式。This class overrides the virtual method , in order to return a type-specific handler when requested by the event system. 這覆寫沒有出現在類別成員資料表，在這個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)]文件因為它是密封的類別所實作的 protected 的成員。This override does not appear in the class members table in this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)] documentation because it is a protected member implemented by a sealed class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。
